file_content.text: Turbolift activated.
Well, look who's alive after all. This here's quite a place.
I got us to the turbolift--hey, they've got spikes!
Bet these chems would fetch a nice price.
Adrenals. Blaster packs. This is good.
I'm going to get my cortical datasplint working again....
We're here to equip ourselves for the Megasecurity Ward. I don't want any distractions.
I need you focused on the job.
We're just having a little fun, boss.
Grab what you can, then we have preparations to make.
Enjoy yourselves, everyone.
Boss has a sense of fun after all.
Do I have your attention? We're not here to play around. Kanjon, get out the equipment list.
Back to work, now!
Course. We're all just letting off steam.
Scorpio Sanctions activated.
I appreciate all of you gathering in one place. Your deaths will be artfully intertwined.
You must've tripped an alarm. I didn't do anything.
This is the second time we've met. You still haven't introduced yourself.
What are you?
That is correct.
We'll be alright. Weapons ready, keep your eyes open.
Everyone, stay calm.
Wait for my word, and nobody do anything stupid.
Shut up, Chaney.
These laboratories were designed for experiments in alien aggression. I have full access to the research and chemicals used.
What is this?
The SLV-88 aerosol was formulated to control the minds and heighten the aggressive instincts of anyone exposed.
Been a long time since I felt this good. Hey!
Die!
Enjoy this experience for the brief time it lasts.
I've wanted to do this a long time, agent.
The Night Herald... it screams in our mind!
You want me to fight, agent? I'll fight you!
You stupid Cipher. I'm finally going to bite your scrawny neck off.
